subject: Re: [junit] Re: Recursive TestRunner -- one implementation
messageBody:
Hi Jeff. Interesting post!

On Sun, 2003-09-28 at 02:11, Jeff Grigg wrote:

> *BUT* for any of this to work, the classes under test must be loaded
> with a custom class loader. This is the rub: Standard JUnit test
> runners load the TestCase classes using the standard Java class
> loader. So when I load the application classes using the
> jAdvise/javassist class loader, the tests can only communicate with
> the application objects using Reflection, because classes and
> interfaces are incompatible when loaded with different class
> loaders. Writing all test logi
